content.en: Blockchain in Healthcare: Researchers are exploring how blockchain technology can be used to address various challenges in the healthcare industry. They are investigating questions such as how to achieve secure sharing of medical data, ensure data integrity and security, give patients control over their medical records, preserve privacy of electronic health records, and develop secure storage and sharing frameworks. These studies attribute agency to blockchain-based algorithms, which are seen as a solution to enhance security, privacy, and reliability in digital healthcare systems.
content.da: Blockchain i sundhedssektoren: Forskere undersøger, hvordan blockchain-teknologi kan bruges til at tackle forskellige udfordringer i sundhedsindustrien. De undersøger spørgsmål som, hvordan man opnår sikker deling af medicinske data, sikrer dataintegritet og sikkerhed, giver patienter kontrol over deres medicinske journaler, bevarer privatlivets fred i elektroniske sundhedsoptegnelser og udvikler sikre rammer for opbevaring og deling. Disse studier tilskriver blockchain-baserede algoritmer agentur, som ses som en løsning til at forbedre sikkerhed, privatliv og pålidelighed i digitale sundhedssystemer.
